name: Dynamic Punch
description: You strike out with a twirling punch that confuses a creature. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing 4d4 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. On a hit, it also becomes confused.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

effect.name: Badly startles Pok√©mon that the audience has high expectations of.
effect.effect: Pokemon that has the highest Visual Round score must make a CHA Saving Throw against Intimidation/Persuasion DC.
